synopsis: In episode #10, hosts Devam and Ahir welcome Rishabh Meswani, founder of the Fremont Debate Academy, for an engaging conversation about the impact of debate on youth development. They dive into the challenges of leadership, the importance of communication, and the balancing act of personal passions and responsibilities, all while sharing humorous anecdotes and insights about navigating life and relationships.
